name: GumTrix - Free - Stretchy candy matching fun for everyone
name_original: GumTrix - Free - Stretchy candy matching fun for everyone
description:
A delicious new take on Candy Matching.

Beware the Candy Reaper! Save the sweets before their sugary demise.

Make your matches before you're stretched to the breaking point.

Use Bombs and Power-ups to save yourself from pointy peppermint doom.

The longer the match, the more the points! Can you beat your high score?
